titleStmt.title: A profitable adventure to the fortunate, and can be unfortunate to none. Being a proposal for raising one million of money, by setling a fund of one hundred and forty thousand pounds per annum for fifteen years only for it.
titleStmt.author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by F. Collins, in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: T.N. (i.e. Thomas Neale).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
